name: Bellyfrog
description:
Bellyfrog is an experimental puzzle game prototype where you have to eat every item in the level in order to progres... however, everything you eat continues to move inside your belly! Ants can reach your heart and kill you, so be careful.

You can eat and spit out crates and ants in order to move around the level; when you're finished getting everything inside the frog's belly, eat the hot pepper to clear it all and complete the stage.

This is my second game prototype, experimenting a bit with some mechanics I though would make for an interesting puzzle game. All assets are made by myself (except for the font).

CONTROLS

  • [left, right] - Move around
  • [space] - jump / leap
  • [control] - eat
  • [shift] - spit
  • [escape] - pause/menu
